thread.title: Hannity’s Trump Interview Delivers 4.8 Million Total Viewers, 1.2 Million in 25-54 Demo
thread.title_full: Hannity’s Trump Interview Delivers 4.8 Million Total Viewers, 1.2 Million in 25-54 Demo

author: Justin Baragona
title: Hannity’s Trump Interview Delivers 4.8 Million Total Viewers, 1.2 Million in 25-54 Demo
text:
Hannity’s Trump Interview Delivers 4.8 Million Total Viewers, 1.2 Million in 25-54 Demo  45   
Last night, Fox News aired the first cable news interview with Donald Trump as President of the United States. The interview, conducted by Sean Hannity , aired in Hannity’s 10 PM ET slot. And from the looks of things, the broadcast really delivered in the ratings. 
According to Nielsen, Hannity drew 4.8 million total viewers and 1.2 million in the key 25-54 demographic. The interview placed in the top five of highest rated broadcasts for Hannity in the 10 PM slot. The 1.2 million in the demo was also tops in all of cable news. 
The Trump-centered program pulled in more total viewers than CNN and MSNBC combined in that hour. MSNBC’s Last Word with Lawrence O’Donnell finished second with a total audience of 1.9 million and 429,000 in the demo. CNN Tonight nabbed 1.2 million total viewers and 474,000 in the demographic. 
Compared to Hannity’s 2017 averages, the Trump interview provided a bump of 62% in total viewers and 87% in the demo. The program was up 110% in overall viewership and 150% in 25-54 in comparison with its 2016 average. 
[image via screengrab]
